article_title: New York Times magazine goes in-depth on Wisconsin's right-to-work fight
article_text: Share your opinion on this topic by sending a letter to the editor to tctvoice@madison.com. Include your full name, hometown and phone number. Your name and town will be published. The phone number is for verification purposes only. Please keep your letter to 250 words or less.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , jessie opoien, right-to-work, scott walker, new york times magazine, dan kaufman, randy bryce, ironworkers, local 8, bill kennedy, wisconsin contractors coalition, local 139, terry mcgowan, local 2304, dave poklinkoski, labor, union
article_metadata.author: Jessie Opoien | The Capital Times

og.description: The story looks at the brief but intense fight over the passage of Wisconsin's right-to-work law, and how it fits into Gov. Scott Walker's likely presidential campaign.
